# The `OptPassGate` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Extensions to this class implement mechanisms to disable passes and individual optimizations at compile time. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::OptPassGate</CodeBlock>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/optbisect">OptBisect</a></>}>
This class implements a mechanism to disable passes and individual optimizations at compile time based on a command line option (-opt-bisect-limit) in order to perform a bisecting search for optimization-related problems. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/optbisect/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

</MembersIndex>

## Description {#details}

Extensions to this class implement mechanisms to disable passes and individual optimizations at compile time.
